title: Last Time You Lied On a Friend
itunes:title: Last Time You Lied On a Friend
description:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines after reports came out about Lou Williams who got caught in a lie about going to magic city "for the wings" and his good friend Jack Harlow went along with his story, so we wanted to know from our listeners when was the last time they lied for a friend. Moreover, we opened up the phone lines to see who our listeners think would win in a verzuz battle between Usher and Chris Brown after that idea was trending over the weekend. And Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Oakland County judge for throwing a 15 year old in juvenile county for not doing her homework

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
